Posts.Content: I go in Oct 17th to talk about surgery. My prostate is very in large and blocks my urination flow. Its painful and antibocs work, but becoming a continute problem. I dont not want a TURP and think im to young for that. I want relieve but not to the point were i cant fucntion. I'm a Marine and have been in 22 years and want to do 30 years but this is becoming a problem for me. Thank you for your advice. Just lost and want to make the right decision.

Posts.Content: I have had 4 Prostate infections/Enlarge prostate. Dr wants to talk surgery. Any suggestions? Had Biospy done a year ago and came back normal. Diganose with Chronic Prostatis. Asking for advice
